publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4013# Cathy Peattie: The Falkirk Herald—That the Parliament congratulates the management, staff and readers of The Falkirk Herald, Scotland’s biggest selling weekly, on the paper being crowned at the 30th Scottish Press Awards as the best weekly newspaper in Scotland for the second year in a row.
S3M-4013# The Falkirk Herald (lodged on 29 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4013# Cathy Peattie: The Falkirk Herald—That the Parliament congratulates the management, staff and readers of The Falkirk Herald, Scotland’s biggest selling weekly, on the paper being crowned at the 30th Scottish Press Awards as the best weekly newspaper in Scotland for the second year in a row. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Michael Matheson*, Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Mitchell*, Bill Butler*, Patrick Harvie*, Patricia Ferguson*, James Kelly*
S3M-4013# The Falkirk Herald (lodged on 29 April 2009) Jamie McGrigor*, Mary Mulligan*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-4013# The Falkirk Herald (lodged on 29 April 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-4013# The Falkirk Herald (lodged on 29 April 2009) Sarah Boyack*, George Foulkes*
S3M-4013# The Falkirk Herald (lodged on 29 April 2009) Karen Whitefield*
